segments.text: Did you get your grades yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . My whole GPA is screwed up now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I bombed my econ final and ended up with a 1.7 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ouch . You must be very disappointed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's my fault because I didn't study as much as I should have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you re-take the class next year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's what I plan on doing unless I keep screwing up . How did you do this semester ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't do that well either . I ended up with a 3.2 this semester . That drops my total GPA to 3.45 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My GPA is pretty similar to yours . I have a 3.1 now because of the stupid econ class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was your GPA before this semester ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was sitting happy with a 3.4 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did it go down so much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's just say I screwed up more than my econ class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I started playing starcraft and ended up wasting a lot of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . I'm not going to play games during school anymore .
segments.speaker: S2
